name: Block Stacker
description:
Stack up the Blocks! This classic arcade game comes to IOS! Stack the blocks on top of each other. miss a block and it will explode! Get as far up in free play mode to submit your high scores to our online leader boards, or take on arcade mode to try and win minor prizes, or go for the major prizes!

Fun and simple one touch control to stack the blocks. Will keep you coming back for hours!

Game modes include:
Freeplay - keep stacking the blocks to see how far up you can get. it gets faster and faster. try top our leader boards
Arcade Mode - Reach the minor or major prize to select the prize of your choice!

FEATURES
* Great great HD graphics with customisable colours in game
* Arcade Mode - Over 60 prizes to win
* Freeplay mode
* Online leaderboards, compare your stacks compared to others worldwide!
* Simple controls -- simply tap the screen
* Fun, addictive gameplay
* Catchy music and sound
